examples.name: Overview
examples.description: Two base demos and links to others

examples.name: Marketo Signup Form
examples.description: Based on a marketo.com sign-up form. The custom validation was replaced with this plugin.

examples.name: Remember The Milk Signup Form
examples.description: The sign-up form from rememberthemilk.com (based on an older version). The custom validation was replaced using this plugin.

examples.name: Multipart Buy & Sell a house form
examples.description: Multipart, implemented using the jQuery UI accordion and a custom method to check if an element is on the current page when validated.

examples.name: Using remote validation with captchas
examples.description: Features remote validation for helping the user to fill out captchas
